content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2021/08/arcanoweave-part-4 html this is part 4 of the arcanoweave doily the pattern continues where part 3 left off starting on round 42 and ending with round 66 the finished size measures about 21 in diameter pattern is written using u s terminology **here are links to the previous sections**- **part 1** arcane aura- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura **part 2** incanter s insight- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight **part 3** evocation- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation **materials needed for part 4** * size 10 crochet thread- 450-475 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * 2-fpdc decrease * 3-fpdc popcorn * special fpdc decrease * large picot * 2-double_crochet cluster russian translation has been provided by ula tomaszewska
